WorkItem.Description:
I was trying to optimize the gear of a warlock and for some reason no gear is loading at all for warlocks. I am unsure if the person who is in charge of it is rewriting the code or something but it has been down since Friday. Thank you for your time!
Â 
-Dragon

Comments.Message:
From http://rawr.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Models:

Warlock	Warlock	New Dev	Cata: Non

No, this is a legitimate bug -- while the model's calculations shouldn't be used for gear decisions, you should definitely be able to see the gear charts. I can repro this as well on the hosted EJ site, even after doing Tools > Reset Item Cache.
No, this is intended. We don't want people using the Warlock model by mistake.

It turns out that if there are no enabled gemming templates, you get no gear in the charts (even for gear that lacks sockets). Looking at the source history of the model, this must have been a change in the base code at some point.
